Author: paperklipp
Text: Yeah I get this when I’ve been low-restricting. Ymmv, but during the periods when I’ve been eating a bit more and my head is clearer, I make detailed To Do Lists for however long I’m intending to restrict/fast. This takes some of the pressure off trying to force the fog to clear because I have all my tasks for the day laid out in front of me and I can sort of mindlessly work my way through them instead of trying to figure out what comes next or what order to do things in or whether I’m forgetting something important.

Author: stevemurkle
Text: imo it’s probably Very ED related. i definitely get tingly/MAJOR brain fog as a result of restricting. i’ve been fasting for a couple of days and the second i stood up out of bed my vision got staticky and i got pins and needles through my whole body://
